justification: I selected ETFs with strong bullish momentum indicators, focusing on those with RSI above 90 indicating potential overbought conditions but high momentum, and MACD line and signal at zero suggesting stable trends. Specifically, QQQ.O, VONG.O, VUG.P, SPYG.P, and XLY.P all have RSI values exceeding 90, which, despite overbought risks, may continue upward in a strong trend, maximizing short-term PnL potential.

Selected ETFs exhibit strong bullish momentum with MACD histogram positive and expanding, RSI above 50 indicating strength, and EMA values supporting uptrends. Specifically, SPYV.P and PPH.O show high MACD histogram values and solid RSI, while VONG.O, SPYG.P, and VUG.P have high RSI and positive MACD signals, suggesting continued upward potential.

Selected ETFs exhibit strong bullish momentum with MACD line above zero and RSI in neutral to strong regions (50-70), indicating sustained upward potential. Specifically, QQQ.O and XLY.P show high RSI and positive MACD, while XLU.P has a strong MACD line, all suggesting continued growth over the next month.
